data.message: I will NOT go a separate app for messaging. I'm leaving the apps altogether if you continue trying to force it on me. I'd rather just use Facebook on my browser, which btw works very well!

replies.message: Hi Dan. We hear your concern. Separating messages from the Facebook app into Messenger allows us to provide a better overall experience to the Facebook community, and linking between the two apps is quick and easy.  - Elissa
Hi Facebook, no having two separate apps is stupid. Just another way for you to steal personal information. Greedy.
